messages.content:
Nice to meet you! I'm your Requirements Engineering Assistant. We're about to start a conversation that will help us gather the requirements for your software project.

Before we begin, can you tell me a bit about the project? What's its goal and purpose? This will give us some context to work with as we explore the specific needs of the system.

(Also, just so you know, our conversation is confidential, and I'll ensure that all information gathered is accurately documented.)

It looks like we might have started again! No worries, let's pick up where we left off. You mentioned earlier that we should start by understanding the project context and goals.

Can you please tell me what motivated this software project? What problem are you trying to solve or opportunity are you trying to capitalize on? This will help us get a better understanding of what the system needs to achieve.

(And don't worry, I'll keep our conversation going until we've got all the requirements nailed down!)
